start.description: You walk towards the Gate of Terror. You feel a chill at the mere sight of it.

boss.description: You notice a large shadow sweep across the ground as a figure flies through the sky. In a flash, the wind unleashes its power as a monstrous claw hits the ground. The creature waves its strong wings while arcing its head back to let out a roar. The Red Wyvern shoots a burst of flame, ready to turn you to ash with its legendary power.

You walk through the gate, expecting to see a wyvern, or perhaps a lich lord, but are instead greeted by an absolutely majestic being. It's beautiful form takes your breath away, and the gracefulness of its legs as they scuttle across the ground are like that of a skilled dancer. But you DO get pretty good loot for killing it, though it would be a shame to end the life of such a perfect being.

end.description: At last! You have conquered your adversary! However, there will be more terrors to come.

monster.description: A tribe of goblins leap out of the undergrowth, weapons at the ready.
A pack of goblins spots you from their campfire. You have a feeling that you're going to become dinner if you don't fight.
Armed goblin soldiers drop down from ropes and you find yourself completely surrounded!
Living slimes ooze out of a nearby puddle!
The ground trembles as the trees in front of you turn into giants, awakened from their long slumber. It is said that those who disturb the tree giants never return.
Oh no! You realize you've crossed into an Ogre's territory...

item.description: A weird mushroom grows on the ground. You remember reading about these somewhere, but you forget if it was harmless or deadly. Perhaps you should stay on the safe side if you have much to lose.
You see some strange looking leaves. No, upon closer inspection, you realize that it's a powerful medicinal herb, able to cure negative effects!
You see some red fruits hanging on a tree. These fruits can come in handy, able to replenish your energy when you are in need of it
You happen upon an especially fine grove of trees with wood that would be great for making weapons.
You found some durable rocks. They are tougher than wood, but heavier as well.
Out of the corner of your eye, you see some iron ore deep in a ravine. Iron is tougher than both woods and stones. It can be of great use to anyone who can smelt them.

arrow trap.description: A lone elf jumped out of the bushes and ambushed you!

trap.description: "WHOOSSH", you hear a sound coming from behind you. As you turn to investigate, you see an arrow flying at you!
As you walk, you suddenly notice traps hidden in the dirt. You narrowly avoid stepped on them... or will you?

trader.description: You meet a skilled potioneer. They may have some helpful supplies you can use on your journeys.
trader.name: potioneer

trader.description: A skilled craftsman is resting underneath a tree, with a pack full of different types of tools for crafts sitting next to him. Perhaps he can make something for you?
trader.name: craftsman

thief.description: A horde of goblin thieves leaps out of the bushes. The leader points at your backpack and then draws a line across his neck. He seems to be demanding your posessions in exchange for your life!

boss.description: You see a huge lumbering ogre that's much larger than the others. Wearing animal pelts, and covering its face with black and white war paint, it carries two huge metal blades covered with blood stains. You're nearly paralyzed with fear!

The earth *TREMBLES* as the all mighty Golem awakens from its shell. The guardian of the Holy Shrine, the ultimate barrier between adventurers and treasures. You can either try to get past it or mark your last step upon this forbidden part of the forest and leave.

end.description: You have conquered the Enchanted Forest! You can always come back for resources another time.

start.description: A river blocks your path. The water flows quickly, and the river is very wide. You could try to wade across, or use/craft a temporary raft to sail over.

legs.description: You to cross the river, but you may have lost some items in the process. Check your backpack just to be sure.

raft.description: You nearly make it to the other side of the river when your raft starts to sink.  Thinking fast, you manage to jump out and manage to reach the other side, though you no longer have your raft.

craft.description: You made a raft of your own with the resources you carried. Your "masterpiece" managed to help you cross over this river. Too bad it broke apart right after you landed on the other side

start.description: You find yourself in front of a dark cave on your journey. Chilling winds come from deep inside. There could be treasures hidden inside, but enemies may also be lurking within.  You should probably use a torch to be safe.

explore.description: You kept walking. Nothing surprising has happened so far.
You reached a dead end. Guess there wasn't anything in this cave...
While walking through the cave, you noticed some mushrooms beneath you!

start.description: BE HOLD! The mythical Shrine of Life. The rumors had it this is the heart of this Enchanted Forest, full of unknowns and dangers. No one has come back alive to tell the tale.

explore.description: You kept walking... The shrine is a long, dark, and ancient hallway. The only light source is the shimmering green lanterns hanging under the ceiling.

The end of this long hall way brings you to a large room with filled with a pool of blue liquid with a ginormous tree rooted in the center. Those are no blue water, as you take a closer at them, what should be your face's reflection is now replaced by videos of other entities. Its almost as if the liquid has taken the souls of past creatures who came near and caged them inside. Suddenly the room shook as the holy tree in the center morphing into a humanoid form.
Just as you thought you walked into a dead end, the rocky boulders infront of you reanimated themselves and start attacking you by surprise!

monster.description: Arghh!! Bony hands clawing their way out of a grave were followed by a skeleton's body, threatening your life!
"Rauuughhh!" . You hear something moving behind a tree. Peeking around, you see the undead eyes of zombies!
A ghost wielding a shimmering battle axe glides towards you. Despite whoever this person was in their previous life, they now only want one thing: human flesh!
As a strong wave of heat surrounds you, a swirling pillar of flame suddenly appears. When the fire dies, you realize a demon had appeared right before your eyes!

item.description: A weird mushroom grows on the ground. You remember reading about these somewhere, but you forget if it was harmless or deadly. Perhaps you should stay on the safe side if you have much to lose.
You happen upon an especially fine grove of trees with wood that would be great for making weapons.
You found some durable rocks. They are tougher than wood, but heavier as well.
Out of the corner of your eye, you see some iron ore deep in a ravine. Iron is tougher than both woods and stones. It can be of great use to anyone who can smelt them.

arrow trap.description: A lone elf jumped out of the bushes and ambushed you!

trap.description: "WHOOSSH", you hear a sound coming from behind you. As you turn to investigate, you see an arrow flying at you!
As you walk, you suddenly notice traps hidden in the dirt. You narrowly avoid stepped on them... or will you?

trader.description: You meet a skilled potioneer. They may have some helpful supplies you can use on your journeys.
trader.name: potioneer

trader.description: A skilled craftsman is resting underneath a tree, with a pack full of different types of tools for crafts sitting next to him. Perhaps he can make something for you?
trader.name: craftsman

thief.description: You suddenly feel a pang of paranoia. Looking back, you realize that a vicious ghost is looming over your head!

boss.description: In the distance, you see a knight galloping towards you. However, as it gets closer, you realize that where a shiny helmet should be, there is now only a bright blue flame!

end.description: You have conquered the Cemetery! You can always come back for resources another time.

start.description: You stumble upon a particularly well-decorated tombstone that might contain some good stuff. What's a little grave robbery now and then?

tombstone.description: A glimmer in the tombstone catches your eye. Digging around it, you found some shiny treasure!
Unfortunately, you only hit dirt. Guess it's just a regular tombstone after all.
SURPRISE! A zombie suddenly popped up from the tombstone!
SURPRISE! A skeleton suddenly popped up from the tombstone!
